title: A1286 820-2850-A no image
message:
Hi,

I have an A1286 820-2850-A that has no image (internal or external).

I have fan spin, USB activity, all voltages on big coils are present, but no image.

Can you help?

title: A1286 820-2850-A no image
message:
Tks for the reply.
No, I didn´t replaced it. I'll do it right away.

title: A1286 820-2850-A no image
message: I' don't have any 820-2850-A board, and i can't find any cap with that size and value on other boards (however, this one seams to be ok). Can i replace it by one of 220uf (C2491) from an 820-3332-A board, just for test propose?

title: A1286 820-2850-A no image
message:
You can use normal size capacitor.
Just need to scratch the trace paint; moving a bit the coil, you get even more space.
Do not use recovered small cap from other 2850 board.

title: A1286 820-2850-A no image
message:
TKS. That solved it!

Thanks again!
